name: Alexey Tikhonov's projects
body:
## Wordpress plugins

### [Zoom OpenSeadragon](https://wordpress.org/plugins/zoom-openseadragon)
Create zoomable galleries from standart wordpress images as well as from deepzoom images. [demo](http://altert.net/demo/openseadragon-zoom)

### [WP Reel](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-reel)
Create interactive 360Â° object movie, panorama or stop-motion animation from wordpress gallery. [demo](http://altert.net/demo/wp-reel-demo/)
## Resourcespace plugins

### [inplaceedit](https://github.com/altert/inplaceedit)
Simple in-place edit plugin for Rersourcespace

## OpenSeadragon plugins

### [OpenseadragonFabricjsOverlay](https://github.com/altert/OpenseadragonFabricjsOverlay)
Fabricjs canvas overlay for openseadragon. [demo](http://altert.github.io/openseadragonfabricjsoverlay/demo.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
